name: NBA Showdown
overview: AMERICA'S ROUGHEST NEIGHBORHOOD Features: - NEW! All 27 1993 NBA teams, plus the All-Stars - NEW! Single games, full season, and Playoffs - NEW! Battery back-up, tracks team standings and league leader stats - NEW! Trade players - NEW! Create dream teams - NEW! Sig moves for rad rookies Zo, Jackson, Laettner and 27 more pros - NEW! Injuries. Subs and Fatigue - NEW! Twice as fast as the original version - T-meter control over free throws - EA SPORTS instant reply If it's in the game, it's in the game.
